content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch in winnemucca nevada,watching sky approx. 2210,shape came into my vision in the se area of sky moving very slowly horizontally,it appeared to be the approx. size of a football to me and appeared to reflect light,even though it was night. it was shaped like a tube/pentagon with ridges like you find used in the vacuum at a bank drive through,it appeared gold/yellow colored,with black edges{lines} on the pentagon shape. appeared for approx. 3 sec then sped at a high rate of speed to the sw still in horizontal movement,not making any sound, then disappeared. i was stunned and watched in awe trying to find an explaination for what i was seeing. after it passed from my sight i told my wife,"i think i just saw my first ufo." then described what i saw to her and showed her in the sky where i saw it
content.summary: Watching sky it appeared moving horizontally very slowly then sped off at high rate of speed still horizontal direction

content.detailedDescription: I was actually watching a video on youtube involving the ex prime minister of defence - canada's statement that he believes in ufo's and sddenly out of the corner of my eye, i watched as an orange-ish light ascended into the sky from the west. at first it was somewhat dim and i couldn't really tell if it was just a star or an airplane or something, but eventually i began to realize that it was moving...And not flashing like airplanes always do. i kept my eyes glued on it as it soared over venus's current position in the sky and it got brighter just after it passed. then a few seconds later, it seemed like it got faster and eventually just faded out entirely as it sailed directly up above and over my apartment complex way up in the sky. definitely close to being outside of the atmosphere if it was even in it at all. in the last glimpse i caught of it, it looked like every vision of a "satellite" in the sky that i've ever seen. so...Did anyone else in the area see that too?
content.summary: Did anybody else just see that...?

content.detailedDescription: This happened between 1:10-1:30 am. at around 1:05 i went out side my house to smoke a cigarette. when i was done i look up and see a slow moving red light. at first i thought is was just an airplane. i keep watching it and it starts to change from red to blue and white in random orders moving north. after about 10 minutes another smaller white light comes close to the object and the small white light dissipates. i then go back into my house to try and find something to record this with. i find nothing and go back outside. now the object is heading west and leaving my line of sight. i lose visual of the object at around 1:30 am.
content.summary: Witnessed a ufo on 4-16-2015 from 1:10am 10 1:30am

content.altitude: Landed, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Well first  my watch was acting funny. at about 6pm the  about 5 minutes later  i saw it
i was spying on some shrubs to put in my afternoon painting  when i  was  looking through my binoculars i noticed a well, squadron of triangular  i think they were fighters and then i saw a white beam come from well over my head and trough the clouds and onto this silver plate looking thing and it seemed to crash but it had friends then there were two silver plates attacking those slower triangular fighters this all happened in about 30 seconds then i heard a big thump like bullets hitting steel and down the hill by my cabin about quarter mile away i saw this silver plate the now looked like a cracked egg spew this purple fire then a whit egg like flying thing landed out of nowhere or maybe i just didn't see it and these  small robot things with spike on there heads came out of it and shot some  beam gun at it and i heard gargles screamed then i saw 4 black suvs pile at the spot from nowhere and scare off these robot spike heads and a black helo came across the horizon and then suddenly crashed for no reason and i was scared so i called the sheriff office and the phones weren't working and some neatly dress men with sunglasses come into my front door and begin harassing me with question like what did i see and what was out there and they grabbed my arm and tried draging me to there really nice 1969 i think model cadillac and i went in the back seat and they put a bag over my head which i could also see through then i hear the tell me that this was a failed training exercise and ask me for some water and my moving truck and about then i was tired so they took the bag off my head and  let me back into my cabin and they left and by that time all those plane reminents were gone and i think i pass out. the next morning i look outside and saw my truck and it for some reason looked brand new and a new plate was on it
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: What seemed like a fighter squadron shot a couple down and they took all of it away almost like a battle

content.detailedDescription: Just triangular lights - but made erratic movement in the sky
content.summary: Saw 2 sets of triangular lights hover then decend over willow lake parl on july 6 or 7 1975. light decended southwest of my observation point.  had a witness to this observation - we knew this was an unusual observationj.

content.detailedDescription: Ran around the side of my house and seen a glowing green orb about the size of a large beach ball  hovering right over top of my basketball goal for about 20 seconds. then i shot off toward the sky and was gone in just the blink of an eye. you couldn't even follow it with your eye it was so fast. it for some reason put a feeling of adrenaline and dread in me when i saw it. i was in a full run and stopped dead in my tracks. it was the first time i saw a orb but it wasn't the last time. my sister saw it as well.
content.summary: Green orb hovering right above my basketball goal then shot off

content.detailedDescription:
November 2, 2014 â€“ 2:29pm

we were traveling on 5 south in oceanside to get on 78 towards escondido.  i took a couple of pictures seconds apart to remember how beautiful the ocean was.  

in the first picture, you can see a green mass on the bridge near the road.  in the second picture the green mass becomes a green orb.

i did not notice the anything unusual in the pictures when i took them and saw the green anomalies in the pictures later that day
content.summary: Green mass then orb

content.detailedDescription: I never wake up during sleep, but for some reason i woke up at 3am and walked out into the back yard, i looked up and instantly my eyes locked onto an orange sphere, the second i looked at it it shot off across the horizon at an incredible speed.  i didn't really think that much of it so i went to back in the house and back to bed.  the next night i woke up a second time , walked outside and again, i saw the orange light in the same place shoot off across the horizon at the same speed and dissapeared. this time i was like "wow, that's the same thing i saw the night before". i noticed it was the same time as well.  i walked back in the house and went back to bed and went t sleep.. the following night, 3am i woke up , went outside and looked up and saw it again. still to this day i have no idea why i woke up.  i sleep good, i never wake up in the middle of the night. so i went back to bed except this time was different. its still really fuzzy, but i have memory of being in a craft, in the water, it was daylight outside. i knew we were in water because there were windows in the craft. in the craft there was a fit women controlling it, and a man who was like me. he was just as amazed as i was. we didn't talk to each other from what i remember, the one thing that sticks in my mind is how i felt while in the craft..I felt what i would only describe as a heavenly feeling..I'd never felt so comfortable. i had no worries, no fear, i felt like i belonged there so to speak. i remember thinking that i never wanted to go back home.  that about it. i woke up at home the next morning and everything felt really strange.  i had a clean  sort of pure energy.  i never felt so healthy both physically and mentally.  the next night was something i'll never forget, i woke up on the sofa and there were beings accumulating in my house, 3 of looked like your typical alien, but a little but different, they had small heads not like a big bulbous head. they were blue and kinda glowy or luminescent.  they didn't speak, they use telepathy and i could tell thy were reading my thoughts. cuz they would answer me with a hand gesture and a thought without me saying anything.  i could go on for a long time telling you about that night. ive had a few experiences since then as well.  i could write a book about all that happened but i don't have the time to do that right now.
content.summary: Across the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 11:30pm eastern time in florida.
i was watching these strange orbs in the sky with my boyfriend. 
we noticed that one of the orbs that had the shape of a plane was releasing star like entities into the air and the star like entities then just disappeared in the heat wave electrical storm above us. i then turned my attention in front of me going nw and shouted "look, straight ahead!"
this massive object was descending at an 85 degree angle. it appeared to have an aura and very bright lights surrounding it's surface. i saw about 4-5 windows that were the size of hurricane windows. it quickly descended we turned our attention away because the object seemed to disappear so fast. we have no idea whether it landed or not but as soon as we lost eyesight with the craft we heard an immediate police, firefighter and ambulance response it was unheard of. we lost count of how many sirens we were hearing after that object had almost disintegrated into the ground.
mind you the whole time this was happening .. there was nothing but heat lightning in the distance of the atmosphere above us. the heat lightning lasted about two-three hours and went on till 2am.
content.summary: I saw many orbs releasing starlike entities into the air

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Viewed many human like people and numerous craft of many different sizes. some of the occupants came into our house but they were more curious than anything. i kept hearing people in our cellar and went to investigate. when i did, to my surprise, there were males, females, children, older male and female counterparts which i assumed are parents of the male and females of the groups. i observed them outside in the back yard which goes into a field. those people seemed to rise up and down our pine trees in our yard. in order to board the big crafts, they would rise up the pine tree which was 50 or more feet in size, like as if they were wearing and anti gravity device. in order to get into our home, they seemed to have some way of physically manipulating our windows locks and to raise up the windows without handling them. they seemed to be friendly but were cautious about revealing themselves to me. it took time for that to happen and when it did i met an unusual looking male occupant. when they spoke they talked at a very low level, now if i remember their lips weren't moving. 

i have been talking with a man from mufon in manchester, ct by the name of steve, but i don't remember his last name and lost his number and contact info when my computer crashed. i need to get a hold of him and he needs to gather all this information. i cannot type all of it, and there are problems with the aliens. they seem to think i had not looked after one of the children who died according to one of the grieving aliens. its a long story and mufon needs to gather this information before the come and get me!!! i'm fairly alarmed at the prospect. i will explain all when mufon contact me...Please hurry...I don't know how long i have...This is all true to best of knowledge and experience with them. 

i could not get any photos as they would come and go quickly, and besides the camera on my phone would drive them away. whole incident lasted 9 days!!! please i'm going nuts!! i don't know what they want.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.features: Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Louvres, Wings, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Insanity

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs out at approx. 11pm. i always check the sky and a star like object appeared west and slightly north, 1:30, to direct west. i took out my phone and tried to take a picture. the object slowly dimmed to black. i continued to attend the dogs. a few minutes later the object reappeared. i tried to get a picture but again it dimmed to black. i went inside and went to bed. as i lay in bed the object reappeared. i must contend it was too close to the horizon to be a star. i took another look with binoculars. the object had a yellow glow when magnified. after a few minutes it disappeared again. i checked a few more time but it did not reappear. object viewed about 20 or 30 mins. it appeared to be suspended out over the allegan county game area. very remote and sparsely populated. i didn't think much more about it and went to sleep. i just saw a sighting in california recently and it looked exactly like the object i witnessed.
content.summary: Glowing orb in north western sky. too low for a star.

content.detailedDescription:
Took family dog to back yard as nightly needs ritual. i always look up and observe night sky. at approximately 82 degrees north i saw movement of yellow white object with movement in southward direction. (object was 10 degrees off of true north to the west). the object then stopped and blossomed by 50% or greater with color change to greenish yellow for about 1 to 2 seconds. object then diminished to original size in stationary location about 87/88 degrees north. the object then ascended straight upward until it could no longer be seen by naked eye.(it almost reminded me of seeing something powering up then immediately ascending upon the completion of doing so)  this observation lasted 5 to 6 seconds yet was definitely an unusual activity over all.
i scan the night sky as i have for many years and am very familiar with general location of stars and visible planets as i have lived in the coachella valley since 1974. this object had immediately captured my attention. i was astonished by the brief yet captivating event. i am a trained and retired investigator and this observation was out of the ordinary altogether. to say i was excited would be mildly explanatory at the least.
this object was not a general aircraft nor meteor. we have three airports within a twenty mile radius and i am very familiar with air-flight within the region.
i have on two occasions spent time in sedona arizona observing the night skies with cat iii night vision equipment. i have observed what i believe to be igc ( intelligently guided craft) and the sighting on 4-15-2015 was very similar in the manner of previous observations of objects blossoming and moving in very similar fashion as i have observed in the past.
i am even tempered, sober and feel compelled to report this observation, this definitely was impactful to myself as i believe this observation was extraordinary in time , location and observable activity.
content.summary: Observed movement of yellow white light , light enlarged >50% changed color to greenish yellow diminshed then ascended upward then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: I think this piece of the ufo was copied to make the covering on the stealth bomber radar proof.  my dad was an aeronautical engineer and a nuclear physicist.  he was also a command pilot in the usaf and stationed at wpafb as deputy base commander.  he also helped design the space shuttle and was involved in our space missions.  he also was involved in the anti-nuclear star wars program and i have letters from pres. regan commending him on his work.  everything he did was top secret, so he never told me anything.  but, he was always fascinated with this tiny piece of metal and would even ask me what i thought about it.  by the way, we could never be stationed overseas, because it was at the height of the cold war.  they were afraid we would be kidnapped, and they could get to my dad and brainwash him.We were only stationed at wpafb and the pentagon or in the dc area.  once, we lived in oak ridge and edward teller would come to dinner at our house.  my dad use to watch nuclear reactions there, and died at the age of 64 due to cancer.  he never told me what he did.  i have found this out from google. and, also i will always remember his fascination with this piece of honeycomb metal.
content.summary: At wpafb, my dad was base commander.  i have a piece of a ufo that was always on his desk..

content.detailedDescription: On april 11th,2005 we were in gatlinburg tn.Circling the park where u go to view historical information about the life and times of the pioneers. we were in the back of our truck on chairs as we circle the loop. i was taking pictures of the site. the sun was lighting up the tree tops above and was taken pictures of the tree tops. at this time i was unaware of the object. after retunring home and observing the pictures did is when we noticed the object. it was visible in a number of pictures. no airplanes or any other flying objects are allowed in this area.
content.summary: Gatlinburg park. around the loop to observe historical site and veiw wildlife

content.detailedDescription: See pictures
content.summary: Hovered over house then moved away

content.detailedDescription: My family was camping on johns mountain. sometime around 10:30pm. it was late and the boys wanted to drive to the top of a long forestry road. my husband and myself were in the front of truck, our dog and two teenage sons were in the back. upon arriving to the top, we were amazed at the beautiful view. the boys were excited to have cell phone service,so they called their girlfriends. it was around 11pm and my husband and i were looking at the moon. i wanted to take a picture of the view. it was at that moment my brand new phone started acting crazy. i looked up and tree top level i observe a perfectly round brightly glowing object coming over us,no sound,moving at a good speed and just as we were all witnessing this,under radar comes a military plane seemed from nowhere, up the side of the mountain. upon reaching the top, the plane leveled just feet from my head, as i was standing on a flat rock. the military plane made a wing tip turn and was clearly chasing this flying orange object. i was terrified of what we just seen. we wanted to get back to the camp site. upon going back we were followed by a black 4 door car tinted windows, and my phone looked to have been zapped at some point, because i had a code instead of letters and i was missing pictures.  this same activity was also reported by 100s of witnesses at 6a.M.The same morning. news channel 9 covered a short story because of all whiteness.
content.summary: Witnesses a military plane chasing a glowing orange/red perfectly round craft, all w/no sound

content.detailedDescription:
November 10, 2013 - 11:06am

we were on our way to sunday brunch and i had to take a picture because the x in the sky looked so cool.  

we were at the stoplight of <removed location> going towards route 100.

the pictures were taken seconds apart and i did not notice the orb when i took the pictures.  clearly the orb moves positions from the first picture to the second one.  the x in the sky is pretty crazy too!
content.summary: X marks the spot

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my brother were heading northbound on the <removed location> my brother called my attention and said, "what is that flying so low"  so i replied, "ahh it's probably a chopper" what happens next gives me the chills just talking about it. my brother said, " if thats a chopper why did all the lights turn off?" i barely caught a glimpse as it passed over and a seen a light or two, but when he asked why did all the lights turn off thats when i payed close attention; knowing that i could possibly be viewing something other-worldly. i stared with all my focus because my bro could not look as we were on the freeway. 
when i observed the craft all i seen was a white light moving slowly to the west of our position at about 100 feet elevation. i kept watching the white light hoping to see it zip off like most ufos will do. but it did not. it went from solid white to a series of strobes: red, green, blue, and some other colors i could not perceive. once it started flashing it did something strange: the ship which must have been a flat diamond or a rectangle stood up as if pointing straight up and began glowing the same colors that were flashing. the ship was glowing because there were some sort of engravings that resemble veins that illuminated the same colors that were flashing which was an extraordinary sight! at this time i was so excited to be seeing this craft and expecting it to zip away i chose not to try and record this ufo, observing such an otherworldly craft was payment enough for me :) as we progressed on the freeway we were losing sight of the ufo from obstructions but as i looked back at what i just observed i can still see the strobing green red blue lights from about a mile away as the ship continued on its way west. this is not my first encounter with a ufo in my city during my first incident about 8 years ago i only seen the craft as it zipped away leaving a trail of solid and strobed lights in its path. im guessing this could be the same craft i witnessed the first time. i believe in aliens and ufos i now understand the feeling of being looked at crazy when talking about ufos. for me i dont expect a gov excuse or explanation for what i saw. what i saw was real.
content.summary: Low-flying flat diamond shaped solid white light the flashed  green red and blue

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i were driving in a car, coming down the hill on <removed location>  it was july, i remember it was hot out. we were stuck in heavy traffic. i said to my mom, what the he__ is that? are you seeing what i'm seeing. she said yes. there was a solid black object, the shape of a blimp, but so much larger, so large that i have a hard time describing it's length, and width. my best guess would be 200 ft.- 300 ft. long, and a few hundred ft. wide. no windows. no sound. the object was going straight up in the air, until it was much higher than the east hill of renton, at that time it leveled off, and went out of view on the other side of the hill.  a few minutes later, the black object came back over the hill, and started descending,it appeared to be coming straight down, as if it were going to land. i know renton, wa., and there would not have been any place for that large of an object to land, especially the vicinity of where it was coming down. when we got  home, i called the air traffic control at the renton airport, i told them what i had seen, i asked if there were any other reports, and they said no. to this day, i have no idea what my mom and i saw.
content.summary: All black object, looked like blimp, but huge, maybe 300 ft long, and a few hundred ft. qide

content.detailedDescription: On april 15th 2015 while fishing at night from shore on houghton lakes east bay at 10:20 pm.  i noticed what i thought was a plane flying somewhat low , as it got closer i couldn't hear any props or engine noise which i thought was weird cause it was soo close. it was treetops high moving very slow like 40 mph slow and the red lights reflected off the water. the front light was red and stayed lit the whole time. the rear light was red and was blinking , the lights ran horizontal to each other about 100' apart. both lights were as bright as ,say a cell phone tower light.  all i seen were the two red lights ,nothing else ! i got in my truck to chase it down and video record it with either my cell phone or video camera.  i couldn't find it because the trees blocked the view of it. it flew slowly over the tree line about2 blocks away from where i was standing and flew over the main highway with zero sound!
content.summary: Watched two red lights comming across the lake while night fishing from shore.  lights were horontally front stayed lit. rear blinked.  it was tree top high and lights reflected on water. moved slow 40 mph ish. no sound  at all. 500 to 600 ' away.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the international space station orbit at 8:57 pm tonight.  when the station was directly overhead i saw another light trail just to the north and slightly behind the station. i saw it for 2 or 3 seconds the the light turned off for a second.  this ratio continued 3 more times until i lost track of it.
content.summary: Trailing light behind space station

content.detailedDescription: My name is james savard i live in vermont on 29 maplelawn drive. essex ctr and i went to go out side to have a smoke and i all ways watch the sky's at night when it's clear i all ways wounderen if something out there and at 10:15 i saw far up in space with the other fate stars and i saw this faint white one jet moving over the ryan stars headed doth east moving very fast and it covered the large sky in just a few minutes  and today i was out there at 8:00 pm and saw the same thing again but this one was in from of the rayan stairs headed south east very very high you have to really look to see these  moving dull lights then same to miss the other dull stars i be leave we have ufos moving around why we don't hear much about this on the news or the us news if i can spot them i know the people who have insterments watching sky's see this and i know you can't see rocks or meteorites up there i will all ways watch the sky's just say i was very close to a very bright light above my trees when i lived on 2a on the boarded line of colchester and milton line in th 80s and i but that in the ufo sighting stite of sitting at my home there i don't know what these font lights are and i think more needs to be done i do know on the history channel or ufo channels they talk about the ryan stars a lot and all these spots on earth and stones and crops   what i saw in the 80s took off and change from round bright light to a tear drop and took off low and crashed and burned in couple hill in milton vermont then in 15 mins fix it's self and headed back in space and no one check that little mountain out and many people saw this because i run into people who tells the same thing i saw  but what are these dull lights i see them but not every nite and some times i do some body must know what's going on in our space there not planes or air baloons rock it's
content.summary: Very high way out above the rion stars

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I took my dog out before going to bed and i noticed a very bright white star-like light in the sky. it was way too bright to be a star so i watched it to see if it was a plane. after watching it for a couple seconds it suddenly moved to the left. that's when i noticed it wasn't a plane because a plane just doesn't slide to the left in the sky. then the bright star-like object moved to the right. after watching it move to the left, dropped down in elevation and re elevated is when i told myself that has to be a ufo. it seemed to be hovering and traveling east but every now and then it would go to the left, the right, down in elevation and back up again. by the time it stayed still in the sky was when it was closest to me. it went from the horizon of the sky to the middle of the sky in a matter of a minute or two with irregular flight patterns. i was really freaked out about what i saw so i went inside right away and told my girl friend. she thought i was seeing things so i told her to take a look for herself. she did not see it move at all but she did say it was a very bright star. in the matter of an hour or so, i went to the window to see if it was still there and it had actually moved sw more towards the horizon where i could see it through the tree line at my house. the weirdest part was that the light was even brighter now and there was another bright white star-like light next to it. the one on the left kept getting brighter and brighter while the 2nd light stayed the same. neither of the two lights were in that area of the sky the first time i went outside and i thought it was really weird that the first one i saw was gone but now there were two in another section of the sky. i told my girl friend that the ufo we were looking at is no longer in the sky and she told that she knows because she saw it more towards the horizon. she is not a believer but she thought it was really weird. i on the other hand do believe and i know that is not normal and had to be 2 ufos of some sort. i actually just got up to see if the 2 bright white star-like ufos are still in the sky and they are. this has been going on for over an hour now and starting to freak me out. the brightest one seems to have stayed in the exact same place and the second one seems to have moved a little higher in the sky. very freaky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright white star-like light with irregular flight patterns. then a second appeared and they hovered together off in the distance.

content.detailedDescription: Okay so this is the second time i see this type of light and i can't make out what it is..The first one i seen was in late march. my spouse and i were leaving from a friends to drive back home now i noticed in the car that my cell phone had the wrong time. it was an hour back then back on the right time 8pm then i asked my spouse what time he had on his cell phone and his phone was changing time too! i couldn't explains this at all i was kinda freaked out because it was both our phones going crazy. as we pull out of his driveway at our left is the chaleur bay and this bright green light came down just off the shore line. at first we thought it was some type of green firework that somebody fired off the shoreline of beresford nb, but then my spouse and i realized that it was nothing like it. it came down from an angle and it was half the size of a car. people convinced me that it was a meteorite. but i've never seen a green light with a trail of orange behinde it.. maybe its a type of meteorite. hopefully someone can tell me. then tonight april 15th 2015 i saw a light like this again but with no orange trail behind it... and the light disappeared right before our eye. this time it was much farther but we both got a good look at it as we steared it for about 7 seconds. so now i decided to ask someone what these lights are because the answer is unowned to me.
content.summary: We seen these driving back home. coming down in the sky under the clouds. bright green light size of half a car.

content.detailedDescription:
April 11th, 1:52am.  took random pictures of the night sky with stars.  none of the stars showed up but in the picture attached 2 lights or orbs showed up. i canâ€™t tell what they are.

my best guess is that the picture is facing the north sky. i took the picture with my arms extended straight up above me.  i did not see anything in the sky when the picture was taken and noticed what showed up in the picture the next day.
content.summary: Lights or orbs?

content.detailedDescription: it was approx.930 p.M. i was standing on my back deck barbecuing a steak, i looked up at the sky wanting too star gaze. i looked west then too the east, there it was, colorful pulsating lights moving in a nw direction, moving smoothly and swiftly no noise, then it was gone. i never in my life seen such a air craft, my father is a former pilot and i love aircraft and that was not any aircraft i've ever seen in my 52 years.
content.summary: There was 4 or five pulsating lights of many colors

content.detailedDescription:
Took 2 pictures of the moon on 4/4 because it was so big and it was a total lunar eclipse that day.  it was 8:50pm and we were driving east on route 100 in pasadena, maryland almost to the route 2 east bound off ramp.

i did not notice anything bizarre in the pictures when i took them but i felt that they probably wouldnâ€™t turn out since we were driving.  

in the first picture to the right and above the moon there is something in the sky.  to me it looks like an â€œhâ€ facing downwards with one side showing up blue.  i also noticed the white specs above the cars in the west bound lane because of the 2nd picture i took.

the second picture i took seconds after the first.  in the second picture there is now something to the left of the moon which looks blue to me.  notice the white specs now in the west bound lane.  they are bigger and clearly have some sort of physical mass giving off light.

very strange.  not sure what i captured!
content.summary: Things in the sky and road

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture of the moon on 3/2 at 8:50pm because there was a bright star next to it.  the bright star barely shows up in the picture but is the white spec to the left of the moon.  what did show up was pink anomaly.  not sure what it is?  i did not see it when i took the picture and did not notice it until i reviewed the picture days later.
content.summary: Something pink by the moon

content.detailedDescription:
In 2002 i saw a blueish light streak across the sky  and seconds later a second blueish light followed it. there were no sounds and no aircraft in the area or chasing it.

in 1981 while driving in new hampshire towards peterbow, i saw lights overhead of me. i was going about 35 mph and there were just a little faster than me. the craft was very large, about 100 feet long and 50 feet wide. it was too close over head to guess how tall it was. it seemed to be made out of aluminum type shiny metal pipes. among the pipes were white,blue,green,yellow and red lights.It followed the road which was highway 101 towards marlborough, heading east towards mt. monadok. i've heard of many strange thing happening near that mountain.
i followed it as far as i could till it turned east and i couldn't follow it anymore

in 1971 while driving in hampshire, i saw a saucer shaped ufo hovering over the powerlines. no sounds and no lights it was about 8 feet by 20 feet in size.  i drove away fast.

in 1967, in salem, mass., was the first time i saw a ufo.  i was 13 years old, my friend were coming home from school near the golf course, and we saw a silver object in the sky.  we thought it was a kite until we noticed it was flying against the wind towards the hospital. then it just hovered near a hill. it was saucer shaped and silver, it had stubby little wings and tail. it was about 15 feet wide. my friend and i  went to get a closer look at it. it had writing on it unlike anything we'd ever seen. when we got home from school we were told we were two hours late from school.  we lost two hours and don't remember it.
content.summary: In 2002 i saw  a blue light streak across the sky and seconds later a second blueish light followed it

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs around 8 30 am in glendale ca  when i spotted an object in the sky hovering and changing color as it spun around on its own axis. it went from bright silver color to dark. it made no sound. i saw no wings or rotor. i watched it for about 5 minutes as i continued walking but after i passed under a big tree i could not see it again. the object was clearly metallic and controlled in some way as it was spinning slowly.  it was not something i had seen before. it was not an airplane or blimp or helicopter or drone. it was hovering at an altitude of maybe 1000-2000ft.
content.summary: I saw a  silvery disc like shaped object  hovering in the sky, turning and changing color
